features: [ Gel & Memory Foam] The inner core of gel prevent heat accumulation and keep your butt cool. Also enhances the density of the cushion for greater support which is loved by heavier people. And the premium memory can keep its shape which is always soft and comfortable. Perfect got office workers and car drivers who often sit for long term.

[Perfect Design] The cushion is made of high-quality and durable memory foam with a cool gel layer. The bottom is made of anti-slip rubber. The protective lining can protect the foam from dust pollution. Machine-washable velvet cover is easy to clean, and built-in handle is convenient for transportation.

[Effective Relief of Backache] The seat cushion conforms to the ergonomic U-shaped design and perfectly fits the hip curve. It can effectively relieve back pain, waist pain, sciatica and other problems caused by sitting for a long time.
[Universal Size] The size of this cushion perfectly matches most seats, and is very suitable for office seats, family seats, aircraft seats, train seats, race stand seats, car seats or wheelchairs.

[Practical Gift] A practical gift for family, friends, boss and colleagues. Ideal gift choice for holiday and birthday. Quickly rebound and return to its original state after use. Extreme comfort and effective support for butt to relieve fatigue and pain caused by sedentary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First pillow I’ve tried for tailbone pain
reviews.reviewText: I got the larger version of the pillow. I first have to admit that the first evening I tried it, I used it backwards! The u shaped pillow is used with the legs of the “u” in the back. That way works better if you have tailbone pain because you sit on it and there’s an open space for your tailbone so that it doesn’t come into contact with anything. It makes sense when you think about it but I don’t always think at first. I felt I should admit to that because I suppose there could be others out there who might not be thinking about it when they first try the pillow out. It won’t work for tailbone pain if you sit on it the opposite way and could definitely aggravate it. But hopefully others are thinking more than I did when they first try this. So I normally sit on my recliner and since I’ve lost 120 pounds, I ended up with tailbone pain. I asked my doctor what kind of specialist would deal with this and she responded that she thought it was probably from loss of subcutaneous tissue and that she didn’t think a specialist would be necessary, that it should try a donut pillow. But Amazon has some things that pop up when you search for something that look even better and I chose this one for the description and the price. And the look that appeared to be more comfortable than a standard donut pillow. I’ve been using it for a couple of days now and I feel that it’s working for my tailbone pain because it prevents me tailbone from making contact with anything, which results in the pain I was having. It’s a hard pillow but I think it needs to be or it might not prevent me from sinking into it and my tailbone would make contact with the seat of whatever chair I’m sitting on. It’s comfortable when I consider the pain I would otherwise be having. I feel this is a good quality pillow and the price is right and I would recommend it to my best friend or anyone else who has tailbone pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great!! It is really soft but firm! My back is feeling better as I am sitting on this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Seat Cushion
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Overall, I really like this seat cushion and I'm glad I purchased it. I'm in grad school and sit in lectures for 8 hours a day. It's very soft and comfortable to sit on and I like that it has the rubber grips on the back so it doesn't slide around in your chair. I really like that it has a carrying handle because it makes it easy to take with me when I can't leave it at my chair. My only complaint is that if you are short like myself, your feet may not touch the ground anymore when you're sitting on this cushion, which can make your legs a little uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased following spine surgery. This seat has held up for weeks with hours of constant sitting. This is important for keeping pressure of my weight off of my spine. It has done that thus far. I researched lots of these in other to make the right choice because I like to spend wisely. This seat is comfortable while holding its shape wonderfully. If you are very consciences of protecting your back you should be pleased with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This gel cushion is heavy yet it slides all around on leather, and not very comfortable. I had a cotton covered foam donut pillow that worked wonders, was so comfy but after 30 years it had to be disposed of and I still can’t find a suitable replacement. Every other one is so much more costly!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: It feels a bit hard in the beginning but the more you use it the more comfortable and softer it gets until it reaches the perfect level of comfort. This pillow is simply fantastic! It has helped me so much with my lower back pain. I would recommend it as well for PG woman who spends hours sitting down while working.

reviews.reviewText: Very Comfortable . However, in the winter it freezes up. Gets a little too firm and cold. I have heated seats so that Helps Independently, it warms up.
